description: You are in a hallway below the deck of the ship.  The hallway goes
north and south and is very poorly lighted.  There is a faint smell
coming from the stern of the ship.
16054.name: Below Deck

description: You are aboard the Royal Eagle - the flag ship of the Krondorian fleet.  She
seems to have been out to sea many times on many voyages.  Crewmen are
working hard cleaning the deck and tidying up the ship in preparation to
set sail.
16019.name: Main Deck of the Royal Eagle

description: You are aboard the Royal Eagle, the flagship of the Krondorian fleet.  She
is preparing to set sale at next high tide.  The crew is swabbing the deck
and trimming the sails in preparation for departure.
16050.name: Bow of the Royal Eagle

description: You are aboard the Royal Eagle, the flagship of the Krondorian fleet.  She
is preparing to set sale at next high tide.  The crew is swabbing the deck
and trimming the sails in preparation for departure.
16046.name: Bow of the Royal Eagle

description: You are aboard the Royal Eagle.  She is preparing to take off on the next
high tide.  The crew is busy disguising her for a pirate's raid planned on
a ship spotted off the coast.
16044.name: Main Deck

description: You are standing on the aft deck of the ship.  From here, you could see
all the people ashore selling their fresh catch.  The ship rocks slowly
back and forth due to the waves that come in to shore.  You begin to
feel seasick.
16008.name: Aft Deck South

description: You are aboard the Royal Eagle.  She is preparing to take off on the next
high tide.  The crew is busy disguising her for a pirate's raid planned on
a ship spotted off the coast.
16024.name: Main Deck

description: You are aboard the Royal Eagle, the flagship of the Krondorian fleet.  She
is preparing to set sale at next high tide.  The crew is swabbing the deck
and trimming the sails in preparation for departure.  There is a hatch on
the floor here.  Sailors go up and down the hatch, it must lead to their
sleeping quarters.
16047.name: Bow of the Royal Eagle

description: You enter a cozy looking room.  There is a large bed in the center of
room with a matress and pillows as soft as the clouds.  There are many
stuffed animals lying on the bed and a small stuffed figure of Furr is
among them.  A lampstand stands next to the bed with a pictures on it.
The upstairs foyer is to the south and the library is to the west.
16108.name: Lance's Bedroom

description: You are aboard the Royal Eagle.  She is preparing to take off on the next
high tide.  The crew is busy disguising her for a pirate's raid planned on
a ship spotted off the coast.
16036.name: Main Deck - Port

description: You are in a hallway below the deck of the ship.  The hallway goes
north and south and is very poorly lighted.  There is a strong smell
coming from the stern of the ship.
16060.name: Below Deck

description: You are aboard the Royal Eagle.  She is preparing to take off on the next
high tide.  The crew is busy disguising her for a pirate's raid planned on
a ship spotted off the coast.
16026.name: Main Deck - Port

description: You are aboard the Royal Eagle - the flagship of the Krondorian fleet.  She
has been out to sea many times on many voyages, some of which are not
completely lawful.  She has been disquised so that she could raid merchant
ships travelling the Blood Sea in order to "improve" the trade.
16016.name: Port Deck of the Royal Eagle

description: You are on the walkway to the Royal Eagle.  Men are bustling about running
errands for the Admiral Amos and his Highness.  These men looked like
they have been out to sea many times judging from their skin.  You may
board the Royal Eagle or leave to the west.
16005.name: Plankway to the Royal Eagle

description: You see the entrance to the ship.
This direction leads away from the ship.
You are aboard the Royal Eagle.  She is preparing to take off on the next
high tide.  The crew is busy disguising her for a pirate's raid planned on
a ship spotted off the coast.
16023.name: Main Deck

description: You have entered into Lance's kitchen.  There are mysterious meats boiling
in various pots on the stove and you wonder if they are edible.  The shelf
is lined with many spices which makes your nose tingle.  There are some
leftovers on the table which he has forgotten to clean up.  The only
exit is south.
16103.name: Lance's Kitchen

description: You are climbing the mast of the Royal Eagle.  It is very windy up
here so hang on tight!  You see all the little men scrambling around
on the ship below.  As you look down, you loose your lunch, breakfast,
and anything else that you ate.  It lands on a pirate below who must
be furious now!  Ewwe!  You can go east or west, up or down.
16081.name: The Mast

description: You enter a bathroom which is very well lit.  There is a shower room, a
sink, and other things that go into a bathroom.  The floor is made of
beautifully designed red marble.  As you think it over carefully, you
wonder why immortals need bathrooms.  You could ask Lance but he
probably wouldn't know either!  The entrance foyer is to the east.
16106.name: Lance's Downstairs Bathroom

description: You are aboard the Royal Eagle.  She is preparing to take off on the next
high tide.  The crew is busy disguising her for a pirate's raid planned on
a ship spotted off the coast.
16031.name: Main Deck - Port

description: You are aboard the Royal Eagle.  She is preparing to take off on the next
high tide.  The crew is busy disguising her for a pirate's raid planned on
a ship spotted off the coast.
16030.name: Main Deck - Starboard

description: WOW!  Look at all the gold and jewelry chests here.  You could buy a
kingdom with all these riches!  This must be the room where the Captain
hides the pirate's plunder he has been accumulating over the years.
You couldn't possibly carry out all this gold.  Too bad.
16076.name: Treasure Room

description: You are aboard the Royal Eagle.  She is preparing to take off on the next
high tide.  The crew is busy disguising her for a pirate's raid planned on
a ship spotted off the coast.
16043.name: Main Deck

description: You are aboard the Royal Eagle.  She is preparing to take off on the next
high tide.  The crew is busy disguising her for a pirate's raid planned on
a ship spotted off the coast.
16038.name: Main Deck

description: You see bunkbeds lined againts the wall.  there are various items scattered
around the room.  The room is very dark.  Sailors come down here to rest
and get their sleep.  They are very grumpy if they miss their naps so be
very quiet in order not to wake them.  You can exit through the west door
or continue on south.
16058.name: Sleeping Quarters

description: You are aboard the Royal Eagle, the flagship of the Krondorian fleet.  She
is preparing to set sale at next high tide.  The crew is swabbing the deck
and trimming the sails in preparation for departure.
16048.name: Bow of the Royal Eagle

description: You are aboard the Royal Eagle.  She is preparing to take off on the next
high tide.  The crew is busy disguising her for a pirate's raid planned on
a ship spotted off the coast.
16042.name: Main Deck

description: This room is used for storing the various supplies needed for a long
voyage.  There are barrels and crates of food and weapons piled up
in the room.  There are no exits except east.
16066.name: Storeroom

description: You see bunkbeds lined againts the wall.  there are various items scattered
around the room.  The room is very dark.  Sailors come down here to rest
and get their sleep.  They are very grumpy if they miss their naps so be
very quiet in order not to wake them.
16064.name: Sleeping Quarters

description: You are aboard the Royal Eagle.  She is preparing to take off on the next
high tide.  The crew is busy disguising her for a pirate's raid planned on
a ship spotted off the coast.  There is a mast here which you could climb
up, but be careful not to fall!
16033.name: Base of the Mast

description: You look up the mast of the ship.  It seems very high and you get a feeling
of vertigo.
You are aboard the Royal Eagle.  She is preparing to take off on the next
high tide.  The crew is busy disguising her for a pirate's raid planned on
a ship spotted off the coast.
16045.name: Main Deck - Starboard

description: You step into Lance's living room.  This is the place where Lance invites
guests over for chats.  There are shoji screens placed at advantageous
points throughout the room to get the best lighting.  A small tea table
is situated in the center of the room with little mats surrounding it.
As you look around the room, you notice that the northern wall has a
television screen set into it and that there are speakers in all four
corners of the room.  The foyer lies south and the dining room is west.
16101.name: Lance's Living Room

description: You are aboard the Royal Eagle.  She is preparing to take off on the next
high tide.  The crew is busy disguising her for a pirate's raid planned on
a ship spotted off the coast.
16025.name: Main Deck - Starboard

description: You are walking along the pier leading to the plank of the Royal Eagle.  The
pier runs north and south from here.
16003.name: {R<{r<{R- {*T{&he {RN{rorth {YN{yew {YT{yhalos {*P{&ier {R-{r>{R>{x

description: The pier continues north from here and takes a turn east.
The pier continues south.
You are walking along the pier.  There is a turn to the east here.  You may
go east onto the plank or south to leave.
16004.name: {R<{r<{R- {*T{&he end of the {RN{rorth {YN{yew {YT{yhalos {*P{&ier {R-{r>{R>{x

description: To the east is the plank where one can board the ship.
To the west is a small shop.
The pier continues south from here.
As you enter this house, you feel slightly disorriented as if stepping
into a different time and space.  His house is modeled in an alien
Tsuranni fashion.  It is sort of a mixture between 9th century Japan and
Korea.  The floor is made of beautifully carved red marble with thin
polished wood for borders.  Shoji screens and walls are seen all over.
His living room is to the north, there is a bathroom west from here and
a stairway leads up.
16100.name: Entrance Foyer in Lance's House

description: You see a wonderfully built staircase leading up to the next floor.
The sea is so vast, it covers the expanse of the horizon from east to west.
The water in the sea is deep red in color thus begetting it its name.  The
color is supposedly caused by an enourmous underwater whirlpool which
stirs the ocean dirt up making the water reddish.
You are aboard the Royal Eagle which is ready to set sail soon.  You are
standing at the tip of the ship.  From here you could look forward and
see the vast Blood Sea.  As you look back, you see all the crew of the ship
busy at work.  The only exit is south of course.
16052.name: Tip of the Royal Eagle

description: You are in a small secret room covered with cobwebs.  It seems that no one
has been here in a LONG time.  The room is very cold and dark.  It goes
east and west.
16075.name: Hidden Room

description: You are standing on the aft deck of the ship.  The ship sways back and
forth slowly, causing you to feel seasick.  Pirates walk around up here
looking for stowaways.  Watch out!  They may mistake you for one!
You can escape down to the main deck or go talk to the captain just
west of here.
16015.name: Aft Deck - Starboard Side

description: You are below deck of the Royal Eagle.  It is poorly lighted down here.
There is a hallway to the south and you also smell an odor from the south.
you could exit to the main deck through the hatch from here.
16053.name: Stairs to the Main Deck

description: You see the main deck of the Royal Eagle above you.
You are standing on the aft deck of the ship.  From here, you could see
all the people ashore selling their fresh catch.  The ship rocks slowly
back and forth due to the waves that come in to shore.  You begin to
feel seasick.
16009.name: Aft Deck South

description: You are aboard the Royal Eagle, the flagship of the Krondorian fleet.  She
is preparing to set sale at next high tide.  The crew is swabbing the deck
and trimming the sails in preparation for departure.
16049.name: Bow of the Royal Eagle

description: You are aboard the Royal Eagle.  She is preparing to take off on the next
high tide.  The crew is busy disguising her for a pirate's raid planned on
a ship spotted off the coast.
16027.name: Main Deck

description: You are aboard the Royal Eagle.  She is preparing to take off on the next
high tide.  The crew is busy disguising her for a pirate's raid planned on
a ship spotted off the coast.
16029.name: Main Deck

description: You stand ouside in Lance's Balcony.  From here, you could see amost all
of Medievia.  There are some majestic moutains towering in your sight.
A slight wind blows through here keeping the air fresh and clean.  This
is a great place from which to gaze at stars on cloudless nights.  There
is a window to the east leading inside.
16111.name: Lance's Balcony

description: You are aboard the Royal Eagle, the flagship of the Krondorian fleet.  She
is preparing to set sale at next high tide.  The crew is swabbing the deck
and trimming the sails in preparation for departure.
16051.name: Bow of the Royal Eagle

description: You are hanging out on the mast of the Royal Eagle.  Litterally!  The
only way to climb around the mast is by using all the ropes dangling
around from the top.  It is very high and windy up here, so don't
look down if you have acrophobia.
16080.name: Out on the Mast

description: You are in a hallway below deck of the ship.  There are doors leading
east and west from here.  The hallway continues north and south.  A
faint odor drifts to you from the southern part of the hallway.
16057.name: An Intersection Below Deck

description: You are standing on the aft deck of the ship.  From here, you could see
all the people ashore selling their fresh catch.  The ship rocks slowly
back and forth due to the waves that come in to shore.  You begin to
feel seasick.
16006.name: Southwest Corner of Aft Deck

description: You are in Lance's dining room.  He invites his guests here for lunch or
dinner.  There is a beautiful marble table with polished wood for borders
in the center of the room.  The marble floor is a polished red with many
beautiful paterns.  You feel like removing your crude shoes.  From here,
you could see the swiming pool to the west.  The kitchen lies north and
the living room is to the east.
16102.name: Lance's Dining Room

description: You see a refreshing pool in which to swim through the glass patio door.
You see bunkbeds lined againts the wall.  there are various items scattered
around the room.  The room is very dark.  Sailors come down here to rest
and get their sleep.  They are very grumpy if they miss their naps so be
very quiet in order not to wake them.  You can only exit north.
16067.name: Sleeping Quarters

description: You are standing on the aft deck of the ship.  This happens to be the
place from which the captain shouts orders to his crew to get the ship
ready for sail.  You stomach wrenches as the ship moves over a large
swell in the sea.
16013.name: Center Aft Deck

description: You are aboard the Royal Eagle.  She is preparing to take off on the next
high tide.  The crew is busy disguising her for a pirate's raid planned on
a ship spotted off the coast.
16034.name: Main Deck

description: You are aboard the Royal Eagle - the flagship of the Krondorian fleet.  She
has been out to sea many times on many voyages, some of which are not
completely lawful.  She has been disquised so that she could raid merchant
ships travelling the Blood Sea in order to "improve" the trade.
16020.name: Starboard Deck of the Royal Eagle

description: You are standing on the aft deck of the ship.  The ship sways back and
forth slowly, causing you to feel seasick.  Pirates walk around up here
looking for stowaways.  Watch out!  They may mistake you for one!
You can escape west and down to the main deck or go talk to the captain
just east of here.
16012.name: Aft Deck

description: You are hanging out on the mast of the Royal Eagle.  Litterally!  The
only way to climb around the mast is by using all the ropes dangling
around from the top.  It is very high and windy up here, so don't
look down if you have acrophobia.
16082.name: Out on the Mast

description: You are standing on the aft deck of the ship.  From here, you could see
all the people ashore selling their fresh catch.  The ship rocks slowly
back and forth due to the waves that come in to shore.  You begin to
feel seasick.
16010.name: Southeast Corner of Aft Deck

description: Wheww!  This was where that odor was coming from.  The rooms stinks of
garlick, old meat and other foods which would make a beggar's face green!
You feel like throwing up due to the sway of the sea and the rotten food
here.  You can exit north.
16063.name: The Kitchen

description: You are aboard the Royal Eagle - the flagship of the Krondorian fleet.  She
has been out to sea many times on many voyages, some of which are not
completely lawful.  She has been disquised so that she could raid merchant
ships travelling the Blood Sea in order to "improve" the trade.  You may
leave the ship by going down the plank.
16021.name: Entrance to the Royal Eagle

description: You are in a corridor below deck of the ship.  The hallway goes east and
west and is very poorly lighted.  There is a door to the south.
16069.name: Below Deck

description: You see the door leading to the Captain's quarters.
You are aboard the Royal Eagle.  She is preparing to take off on the next
high tide.  The crew is busy disguising her for a pirate's raid planned on
a ship spotted off the coast.
16032.name: Main Deck

description: It is a huge ship belonging to the royal family.  On its side is painted in
big bold letters : THE ROYAL EAGLE.
You stand at the beginning of a pier where ships come in and out.  The smells
of fish being loaded on and off the ships here are overwhelming.  There is a
large ship docked to the east.  The pier continues north and south to the
dock.
16000.name: {R<{r<{R- {*T{&he {RN{rorth {YN{yew {YT{yhalos {*P{&ier {R-{r>{R>{x

description: The pier continues north.
The Dock.
You are astounded by the number of valuable books in this room.  Lance's
collection includes some original volumes on the history oh Medievia.
There is a shelf full of Shakespear's most popular works.  There is a
special shelf in which is encased Raymond E. Feist's books : Magician.
You may walk in all four directions from here.
16109.name: Lance's Private Library

description: You see Lance's Private Study.
You see a majestic view of the mountains through the window.
You are hanging out on the mast of the Royal Eagle.  Litterally!  The
only way to climb around the mast is by using all the ropes dangling
around from the top.  You feel like Peter Pan for some strange reason.
16079.name: Out on the Mast

description: You are aboard the Royal Eagle.  She is preparing to take off on the next
high tide.  The crew is busy disguising her for a pirate's raid planned on
a ship spotted off the coast.
16037.name: Main Deck

description: This is so small, you can barely see it.  It seems to show a picture of
a dagger pointed down at a set of skull and crossbones.
Upon closer inspection, you see that the crevice is as high and thin as a
coin slot.  You also notice a small symbol carved into the wood just above
the slot.
You are aboard the Royal Eagle - the flag ship of the Krondorian fleet.  She
seems to have been out to sea many times on many voyages.  Crewmen are
working hard cleaning the deck and tidying up the ship in preparation to
set sail.  There seems to be a slight crevice in the south wall, the
weather must have really worn this ship out.
16017.name: Main Deck of the Royal Eagle

description: You notice a crevice in the wall.  It may just have been weatherworn.
You are in a small secret room covered with cobwebs.  It seems that no one
has been here in a LONG time.  The room is very cold and dark.  It goes
east of here and there is a door to the north.
16074.name: Hidden Room

description: You see the main deck of the Royal Eagle.
You are aboard the Royal Eagle.  She is preparing to take off on the next
high tide.  The crew is busy disguising her for a pirate's raid planned on
a ship spotted off the coast.
16040.name: Main Deck - Starboard

description: As you enter the pool, all your muscles relax and all the problems of
the day dissapear into the back of your head.  All you want to do is
float here endlessly.  The water seems to heal your body and soul.
It is very peaceful and quiet here.  You could swim to a bonsai garden
to the south or a patio door to the east.
16104.name: Lance's Backyard Swiming Pool

description: You can see Lance's house through the patio screen.
You see a wonderfully arranged bonsai garden!
You see bunkbeds lined againts the wall.  there are various items scattered
around the room.  The room is very dark.  Sailors come down here to rest
and get their sleep.  They are very grumpy if they miss their naps so be
very quiet in order not to wake them.  The store rooms are south of here.
16062.name: Sleeping Quarters

description: This remote shop located by the seashore sells trinkets made from everything
immaginable.  The walls are stacked with shelves and shelves of multi-colored
potions and wands.  A traveller can find all the things he needs for any
journeys he may plan.  Try out the delicious seafood they serve here!
16084.name: Seashells Galore

description: You are walking along the pier leading to the plank of the Royal Eagle.  The
pier runs north and south from here.
16001.name: {R<{r<{R- {*T{&he {RN{rorth {YN{yew {YT{yhalos {*P{&ier {R-{r>{R>{x

description: The pier continues north.
You see the entrance to the pier.
This is the room in which Lance does his work.  He talks to people about
improving the game and making adjustments here.  If you needed to talk
to him in private, he would bring you here.  There is a computer desk
against the wall where Lance writes up new ideas for the game.  Papers
are scattered all over the table.  There are various notes and reminders
written on Post-It paper stuck on the computer's side.  There is a small
magic portal in the east wall of the room.
16110.name: Lance's Private Study

description: Lance comes here to excercise and improve his skills.  There are a number
of excercise equipment around the room.  There is a mat in the center from
which Lance practices his martial arts.  He also comes here to meditate.
The only exit is north.
16112.name: Lance's Workout Room

description: You are aboard the Royal Eagle.  She is preparing to take off on the next
high tide.  The crew is busy disguising her for a pirate's raid planned on
a ship spotted off the coast.
16028.name: Main Deck

description: You are standing on the aft deck of the ship.  From here, you could see
all the people ashore selling their fresh catch.  The ship rocks slowly
back and forth due to the waves that come in to shore.  You begin to
feel seasick.
16007.name: Aft Deck South

description: You are in a corridor below deck of the ship.  The hall is very poorly
lighted.  The exits are east and there is a door to the south.
16068.name: Below Deck - Port

description: You see the door leading to the First Mate's quarters.
You are aboard the Royal Eagle.  She is preparing to take off on the next
high tide.  The crew is busy disguising her for a pirate's raid planned on
a ship spotted off the coast.
16039.name: Main Deck

description: You are in a corridor below deck of the ship.  The hall is very poorly
lighted.  The exits are west and there is a door to the south.
16070.name: Below Deck - Starboard

description: You see the door leading to the Navigator's quarters.
This is the second level of Lance's house where his private quarters are.
His house is modeled in an alien Tsuranni fashion.  It is sort of a
mixture between 9th century Japan and Korea.  The floor is made of
beautifully carved red marble with thin polished wood for borders.
Shoji screens and walls are placed all over making it seem plain and
yet still very appealing.  The staircase leads down to the entrance
foyer and there is a private library to the north.
16107.name: Lance's Upstairs Foyer

description: You see a staircase leading down to the entrance foyer.
This room is very messy.  There is a small table against the wall with a
little lamp on it.  Clothing is scattered all over the floor and you see
empty bottles of beer here and there.  Sheets on the bed are crumpled
up as if they haven't been washed in decades.
16071.name: First Mate's Quarters

description: It seems to squeak.  It could be a door of some kind.
You are aboard the Royal Eagle - the flag ship of the Krondorian fleet.  She
seems to have been out to sea many times on many voyages.  Crewmen are
working hard cleaning the deck and tidying up the ship in preparation to
set sail.  The floorboard here seems to creak as you walk across it.  You
think to yourself, "Geez, this ship sure needs some repairs!"
16018.name: Main Deck of the Royal Eagle

description: The floorboards seem to squeak.
You are walking along the pier leading to the plank of the Royal Eagle.  The
pier runs north and south from here.
16002.name: {R<{r<{R- {*T{&he {RN{rorth {YN{yew {YT{yhalos {*P{&ier {R-{r>{R>{x

description: The pier continues north.
The pier continues south.
You are standing on the aft deck of the ship.  The ship sways back and
forth slowly, causing you to feel seasick.  Pirates walk around up here
looking for stowaways.  Watch out!  They may mistake you for one!
You can escape east and down to the main deck or go talk to the captain
just west of here.
16014.name: Aft Deck

description: You see bunkbeds lined againts the wall.  there are various items scattered
around the room.  The room is very dark.  Sailors come down here to rest
and get their sleep.  They are very grumpy if they miss their naps so be
very quiet in order not to wake them.
16061.name: Sleeping Quarters

description: This is the Captain's room.  He seems to be very tidy for a pirate.  There
are various articles of note in this room, most of which are keepsakes from
his other expeditions by the looks of it.  In the center of the room is a
small table, and you see his log on top of it.  The Captain is rarely here.
He must be outside commanding the crew, but if he sees you in here,
he will be VERY upset, so get out quick!
16072.name: Captain's Quarters

description: You are standing on the aft deck of the ship.  The ship sways back and
forth slowly, causing you to feel seasick.  Pirates walk around up here
looking for stowaways.  Watch out!  They may mistake you for one!
You can escape down to the main deck or go talk to the captain just
east of here.
16011.name: Aft Deck - Port Side

description: You are aboard the Royal Eagle.  She is preparing to take off on the next
high tide.  The crew is busy disguising her for a pirate's raid planned on
a ship spotted off the coast.
16041.name: Main Deck - Port

description: You see bunkbeds lined againts the wall.  there are various items scattered
around the room.  The room is very dark.  Sailors come down here to rest
and get their sleep.  They are very grumpy if they miss their naps so be
very quiet in order not to wake them.
16059.name: Sleeping Quarters

description: This room is used for storing the various supplies needed for a long
voyage.  There are barrels and crates of food and weapons piled up
in the room.  You can go east or south from here.
16065.name: Storeroom

description: You see bunkbeds lined againts the wall.  there are various items scattered
around the room.  The room is very dark.  Sailors come down here to rest
and get their sleep.  They are very grumpy if they miss their naps so be
very quiet in order not to wake them.  You can exit through the east door
or continue on south.
16056.name: Sleeping Quarters

description: You are climbing the mast of the Royal Eagle.  It is very windy up
here so hang on tight!  You see all the little men scrambling around
on the ship below.  You can go east or west, up or down.
16078.name: The Mast

description: You are hanging out on the mast of the Royal Eagle.  Literally!  The
only way to climb around the mast is by using all the ropes dangling
around from the top.  You feel like Peter Pan for some strange reason.
16077.name: Out on the Mast

description: You are aboard the Royal Eagle.  She is preparing to take off on the next
high tide.  The crew is busy disguising her for a pirate's raid planned on
a ship spotted off the coast.
16022.name: Main Deck

description: You are at the highest point on the ship.  From here you can almost see
Castle Square.  You see all the little dots scrambling around below you.
This is where the lookout is posted.  Suddenly, the swaying of the ship
and the height gets to you and you let loose your dinner.  Ewwe!
16083.name: Crow's Nest

description: You get dizzy and can't help but throw up again!
You step into a miniature world as you enter the garden.  There are many
bonsai in the area, each and everyone in healthy condition.  You feel
clumsy walking around in such perfection.  A small brook runs here which
waters all these trees.  You may enter the swimming pool to the north.
16105.name: Lance's Bonsai Garden

description: This room is filled with maps from wall to wall.  There is a huge table in
center with a map showing the ocean currents and winds.  Navigation
instruments have been laid all over the table.
16073.name: Navigator's Quarters

description: You are aboard the Royal Eagle.  She is preparing to take off on the next
high tide.  The crew is busy disguising her for a pirate's raid planned on
a ship spotted off the coast.
16035.name: Main Deck - Starboard

description:
The captain is a man in his fifties.  What's left of his hair is slicked
and tied at the back of his head.  He has had much experience in
commanding rowdy pirate crews.  He has a tough, weather-worn face and
a stern complextion.  He must have been BAD to get into such a command
so don't mess with him!
16000.room_name: Captain Amos Trask is here yelling orders to his crew.
16000.name: The Captain~

description:
The navigator looks rather busy.  He has a pencil stuck on his ear.
He is a rather young scholar with some minor experience in navigation.
He looks like he has been missing some sleep because of working on all
those maps.  Yet, he still seems ready to react to anything quickly
and defend himself if necessary.  He tells you to leave his equipment
alone!
16001.room_name: The ship's navigator is trying to figure out which sea route to take.
16001.name: The Navigator~

description:
The first mate looks rather stressed.  He has been doing things for
the captain all day and is now relieved to have his break.  He seems
to have an air of command around him which must explain why he got
his position on the ship as a First Mate.
16002.room_name: The First Mate is taking a break from the Captain's sharp tongue.
16002.name: The First Mate~

description:
The cook is rather sloppy.  His hands are as dirty as his clothing.  He
is running around the room preparing one thing after the next.  He
constantly keeps an eye on the big cauldron in the center of the room.
It looks like he mixes whatever leftovers he has into the cauldron and
calls it food.  For some strange reason, you loose your appetite.
16003.room_name: The ship's Cook is preparing Gak for the crew to eat.
16003.name: The Ship's Cook~

description:
You barely notice him in the dim light.  He is very lithe and subtle in
his movements.  He looks trained to kill in a single blow, so don't get
on his bad side!
16004.room_name: The hired assassin is standing here guarding the's pirates' plunder.
16004.name: The Hired Assassin Guard~

description:
The pirate looks quite at peace.  The harsh lines of trouble are gone
from his face, taken away by the sandman.  I bet he would be VERY
upset if you woke him up, so step lightly.
16005.room_name: A raggedy pirate is sleeping here.
16005.name: The sleepy pirate~

description:
The pirate looks quite frustrated.  He doesn't seem to be going anywhere
in his argument with his parrot.  You wonder who has higher intellect ...
the bird or the pirate?
16006.room_name: A pirate is standing here talking to his parrot.
16006.name: The pirate~

description:
His face is red and his ears almost seem to be blowing steam!  What did
you do to make him so mad?
16007.room_name: An angry pirate is standing here cursing at you!
16007.name: The angry pirate~

description:
He sways left and right as he walks.  The pirate is constantly plugging
his mouth with a bottle of beer.  As he swears, drool comes spitting
out of his mouth. Yuk!
16008.room_name: A very drunk pirate is swearing his troubles away!
16008.name: The drunk pirate~

description:
He has been standing out in the sun for hours doing nothing but getting
a really bad tan.  He sure could use a friend to talk to.
16009.name: The swashbuckler~

description:
He looks like the quiet type.  But don't let looks decieve you, he could
be very deadly in combat.
16010.room_name: A bucaneer is standing here observing you.
16010.name: The bucaneer~

description:
He looks like a very hardworking man.  His energy seems inexhaustible.
When you try to talk to him, he gruffly says,"Work! Work! Work! That's
all we do everyday! WORK!"
16011.room_name: A midshipman is kneeling here swabbing the deck.
16011.name: The midshipman~

description: He looks like a happy-go-lucky man who takes things as they come.
16012.room_name: The sailor is standing here enjoying the sea breeze.
16012.name: The sailor~

description: This is the BIGGEST rat you've ever seen!  He has razor sharp teeth!
16013.room_name: A seafaring rat is scurrying around scavenging for food.
16013.name: The seafaring rat~

description: He peers intently in all directions and keeps an eye on the weather.
16014.room_name: A lookout has been posted here to search for signs of danger.
16014.name: The Lookout~

description: She is a pretty young girl standing behind the counter watching the shop.
16015.room_name: She sells seashells by the seashore.
16015.name: She~

description:
He is wise old man.  His stumpy figure reveal surprising speed and
agility.  He must keep fit by practicing his karate.  He loves to work
with bonsai in the garden.  Mr. Myagi is a warm friendly person, so
if you have any troubles, tell him and he will help you.
16100.room_name: Mr. Miyagi is here tending to his bonsai.
16100.name: Mr. Miyagi~
